contents.content: STX is a simple markup language for creating documents.
The STX files are parsed line by line; if a line starts with a

,

ll the subsequent lines which have the indentation aligned to the first

on-space character after the mark are be considered the inner content of the

lement that represents the given mark, this content is parsed in the same way

ine by line, but considering the indentation.

When the indentation is broken, the inner content is broken as well closing

he element and starting again the parsing line by line.

his mechanism allows to create nested elements.

When a line doesn't start with a reserved mark, it is considered a paragraph;

he paragraphs are broken by one empty line.

wo or more empty lines result in exiting from a section or just a separation

hen there is no section to exit.
